00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_TUIOCONTAINER_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_TUIOCONTAINER_H
00024 
00025 #include "TuioPoint.h"
00026 #include <list>
00027 
00028 #define TUIO_ADDED 0
00029 #define TUIO_ACCELERATING 1
00030 #define TUIO_DECELERATING 2
00031 #define TUIO_STOPPED 3
00032 #define TUIO_REMOVED 4
00033 #define TUIO_ROTATING 5
00034 
00035 namespace TUIO {
00036         
00043         class LIBDECL TuioContainer: public TuioPoint {
00044                 
00045         protected:
00049                 long session_id;
00053                 float x_speed;
00057                 float y_speed;
00061                 float motion_speed;
00065                 float motion_accel;
00069                 std::list<TuioPoint> path;
00073                 int state;
00077                 const char *source_name;
00081                 const char *source_addr;
00082                 
00083         public:
00084                 using TuioPoint::update;
00085                 
00095                 TuioContainer (TuioTime ttime, long si, float xp, float yp):TuioPoint(ttime, xp,yp) {
00096                         session_id = si;
00097                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00098                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00099                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00100                         motion_accel = 0.0f;                    
00101                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00102                         path.push_back(p);
00103                         
00104                         state = TUIO_ADDED;
00105                         source_name = "local";
00106                         source_addr = "127.0.0.1";
00107                 };
00108 
00117                 TuioContainer (long si, float xp, float yp):TuioPoint(xp,yp) {
00118                         session_id = si;
00119                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00120                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00121                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00122                         motion_accel = 0.0f;                    
00123                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00124                         path.push_back(p);
00125                         
00126                         state = TUIO_ADDED;
00127                         source_name = "local";
00128                         source_addr = "127.0.0.1";
00129                 };
00130                 
00137                 TuioContainer (TuioContainer *tcon):TuioPoint(tcon) {
00138                         session_id = tcon->getSessionID();
00139                         x_speed = 0.0f;
00140                         y_speed = 0.0f;
00141                         motion_speed = 0.0f;
00142                         motion_accel = 0.0f;
00143                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00144                         path.push_back(p);
00145                         
00146                         state = TUIO_ADDED;
00147                         source_name = "local";
00148                         source_addr = "127.0.0.1";
00149                 };
00150                 
00154                 virtual ~TuioContainer(){};
00155 
00159                 virtual void setTuioSource(const char *name, const char *addr) {
00160                         source_name = name;
00161                         source_addr = addr;
00162                 };
00163 
00167                 virtual const char* getTuioSourceName() const{
00168                         return source_name;
00169                 };
00170 
00174                 virtual const char* getTuioSourceAddress() const{
00175                         return source_addr;
00176                 };
00177                 
00187                 virtual void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp) {
00188                         TuioPoint lastPoint = path.back();
00189                         TuioPoint::update(ttime,xp, yp);
00190                         
00191                         TuioTime diffTime = currentTime - lastPoint.getTuioTime();
00192                         float dt = diffTime.getTotalMilliseconds()/1000.0f;
00193                         float dx = xpos - lastPoint.getX();
00194                         float dy = ypos - lastPoint.getY();
00195                         float dist = sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);
00196                         float last_motion_speed = motion_speed;
00197                         
00198                         x_speed = dx/dt;
00199                         y_speed = dy/dt;
00200                         motion_speed = dist/dt;
00201                         motion_accel = (motion_speed - last_motion_speed)/dt;
00202                         
00203                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00204                         path.push_back(p);
00205                         
00206                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00207                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00208                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00209                 };
00210 
00211                 
00216                 virtual void stop(TuioTime ttime) {
00217                         update(ttime,xpos,ypos);
00218                 };
00219 
00232                 virtual void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float xs, float ys, float ma) {
00233                         TuioPoint::update(ttime,xp, yp);
00234                         x_speed = xs;
00235                         y_speed = ys;
00236                         motion_speed = (float)sqrt(x_speed*x_speed+y_speed*y_speed);
00237                         motion_accel = ma;
00238                         
00239                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00240                         path.push_back(p);
00241                         
00242                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00243                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00244                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00245                 };
00246                 
00257                 virtual void update (float xp, float yp, float xs, float ys, float ma) {
00258                         TuioPoint::update(xp,yp);
00259                         x_speed = xs;
00260                         y_speed = ys;
00261                         motion_speed = (float)sqrt(x_speed*x_speed+y_speed*y_speed);
00262                         motion_accel = ma;
00263                         
00264                         path.pop_back();
00265                         TuioPoint p(currentTime,xpos,ypos);
00266                         path.push_back(p);
00267                         
00268                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00269                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00270                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00271                 };
00272                 
00280                 virtual void update (TuioContainer *tcon) {
00281                         TuioPoint::update(tcon);
00282                         x_speed = tcon->getXSpeed();
00283                         y_speed =  tcon->getYSpeed();
00284                         motion_speed =  tcon->getMotionSpeed();
00285                         motion_accel = tcon->getMotionAccel();
00286                         
00287                         TuioPoint p(tcon->getTuioTime(),xpos,ypos);
00288                         path.push_back(p);
00289                         
00290                         if (motion_accel>0) state = TUIO_ACCELERATING;
00291                         else if (motion_accel<0) state = TUIO_DECELERATING;
00292                         else state = TUIO_STOPPED;
00293                 };
00294                 
00301                 virtual void remove(TuioTime ttime) {
00302                         currentTime = ttime;
00303                         state = TUIO_REMOVED;
00304                 }
00305 
00310                 virtual long getSessionID() const{ 
00311                         return session_id;
00312                 };
00313                 
00318                 virtual float getXSpeed() const{ 
00319                         return x_speed;
00320                 };
00321 
00326                 virtual float getYSpeed() const{ 
00327                         return y_speed;
00328                 };
00329                 
00334                 virtual TuioPoint getPosition() const{
00335                         TuioPoint p(xpos,ypos);
00336                         return p;
00337                 };
00338                 
00343                 virtual std::list<TuioPoint> getPath() const{
00344                         return path;
00345                 };
00346                 
00351                 virtual float getMotionSpeed() const{
00352                         return motion_speed;
00353                 };
00354                 
00359                 virtual float getMotionAccel() const{
00360                         return motion_accel;
00361                 };
00362                 
00367                 virtual int getTuioState() const{ 
00368                         return state;
00369                 };      
00370                 
00375                 virtual bool isMoving() const{ 
00376                         if ((state==TUIO_ACCELERATING) || (state==TUIO_DECELERATING)) return true;
00377                         else return false;
00378                 };
00379         };
00380 };
